Isaac Gregson

Front-end Developer

Greetings. I've been building on the web for over 6 years. By day (and sometimes night) I work as a front-end developer for Azure Standard. When not on the clock or with with family and friends I'm in side-project world having fun with Elm, Vue, Hugo, Netlify, and other exciting new tools. Regardless of the technology, I'm dedicated to clean code and productive developer workflows. My mission is to deliver the best user experience possible. It's been a rewarding journey thus far, may it ever continue.
